review: This was the perfect option for our TV in our living room where the family watches netflix. We used to have to hook up someone's in the family's laptop to watch it, but this solved that inconvenience. Have had it for 6 months now and never had an issue. WELL worth the low price!

review: The Amazon Fire Stick is awesome! We have an Xbox One downstairs but the kids were always wanting to watch TV as well. I can hook up the Fire Stick to my daughters TV and they can watch Netflix, Sling TV and even Amazon Prime movies and more upstairs. Please note that you can't access Sling TV on multiple devices at the same time though.Depending on how your TV is set up you may need to use a USB sort of plug to install it the more difficult way but all wiring comes with and directions are easy to understand.
